JobFullDesc: Job Responsibility:	* Work out yearly sales capacity plan down to apparel silhouette/gender, footwear category and equipment silo. level and keep rolling it on monthly basis.	* Recommend seasonal rebuy OTB on silhouette/category/gender level through	* Align with inventory management team from the supply side;	* Base on value merchandising assortment strategy.	* Weekly review sales performance and inventory status to identify the risks and opportunities to enable trade decisions.	* Through the weekly trading process to generate rolling forecast for next 13 weeks sales plan.	* Baseline for location planning to generate store level weekly rolling plan on category/silhouette level.	* To determine and give direction to allocation team on weekly DC shipment target by category/silo.	* Develop monthly shipment plan based on most updated sales forecast and supply by silo/gender/category for supply chain capacity, allocation replenishment arrangement and inventory management team to generate geo. inventory forecast.	* Weekly and monthly review and assess in season C/O supply health to trigger action plans based on risks and opportunities from supply side. 	* Split monthly sales plan into daily level in terms of revenue, units, markdown and MSRP to give a daily plan to track value business and signal business risk and opportunity to trigger quick actions.
